refnamediv.refpurpose: A spreadsheet column widget for GtkSheet

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: "dataformat" gchar* : Read / Write "datatype" gchar* : Read / Write "description" gchar* : Read / Write "entry-type" GtkSheetEntryType : Read / Write "iskey" gboolean : Read / Write "justification" GtkJustification : Read / Write "label" gchar* : Read / Write "max-length" gint : Read / Write "max-length-bytes" gint : Read / Write "position" gint : Read / Write "readonly" gboolean : Read / Write "visible" gboolean : Read / Write "vjust" GtkSheetVerticalJustification : Read / Write "width" gint : Read / Write "wrap-mode" GtkWrapMode : Read / Write

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GtkSheetColumn provides properties for sheet columns.

refsect2.title: GtkSheetColumn
refsect2.para: The GtkSheetColumn struct contains only private data. It should only be accessed through the functions described below.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_add_column ()
refsect2.para: Append ncols columns to the right of the sheet.

listitem.simpara: number of columns to be appended.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_insert_columns ()
refsect2.para: Insert ncols columns before the given row and pull right.

listitem.simpara: number of columns to be inserted.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_delete_columns ()
refsect2.para: Delete ncols columns starting from col.

listitem.simpara: number of columns to be deleted.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_get_columns_count ()
refsect2.para: Get the number of the columns of the GtkSheet.

listitem.simpara: (transfer none) the requested GtkSheetColumn or NULL

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_get_index ()
refsect2.para: find index of colobj in GtkSheet

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_select_column ()
refsect2.para: Select the column. The range is then highlighted, and the bounds are stored in sheet->range.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_titles_visible ()
refsect2.para: Get the visibility of sheet column titles .

listitem.simpara: column title, do not modify or free it.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_set_column_title ()

listitem.simpara: TRUE - the column is sensitive, FALSE - insensitive or not existant

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_sensitivity ()
refsect2.para: Set column button sensitivity. If sensitivity is TRUE it can be toggled, otherwise it acts as a title.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_columns_set_sensitivity ()
refsect2.para: Set all columns buttons sensitivity. If sensitivity is TRUE button can be toggled, otherwise act as titles. The sheet itself has no such property, it is a convenience function to set the property for all existing columns.

listitem.simpara: TRUE - visible, FALSE - hidden or not existant

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_visibility ()
refsect2.para: Default value is TRUE. When set to FALSE, the column is hidden.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_label_set_visibility ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_sheet_column_label_set_visibility (GtkSheet *sheet, gint col, gboolean visible);
refsect2.para: Set column label visibility. The default value is TRUE. If FALSE, the column label is hidden.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_columns_labels_set_visibility ()
refsect2.para: Set all columns labels visibility. The default value is TRUE. If FALSE, the columns labels are hidden. The sheet itself has no such property, it is a convenience function to set the property for all existing columns.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_set_column_width ()
gtk_sheet_column_set_justification ()
refsect2.para: Set column justification (GTK_JUSTIFY_LEFT, RIGHT, CENTER). The default value is GTK_JUSTIFY_LEFT. If autoformat is on, the default justification for numbers is GTK_JUSTIFY_RIGHT.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_get_vjustification ()
refsect2.para: Get the vertical cell text justification. This overrides the default vertical cell text justification of the GtkSheet.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_vjustification ()
gtk_sheet_column_button_add_label ()
refsect2.para: Set button label.It is used to set a column title.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_button_justify ()
refsect2.para: Set the justification(alignment) of the column buttons.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_get_tooltip_markup ()
refsect2.para: Gets the contents of the tooltip (markup) for the column

listitem.simpara: the tooltip text, or NULL. You should free the returned string with g_free() when done.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_tooltip_markup ()
refsect2.para: Sets markup as the contents of the tooltip, which is marked up with the Pango text markup language.

listitem.simpara: the contents of the tooltip for widget, or NULL.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_get_tooltip_text ()
refsect2.para: Gets the contents of the tooltip for the column

listitem.simpara: the tooltip text, or NULL. You should free the returned string with g_free() when done.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_tooltip_text ()
refsect2.para: Sets text as the contents of the tooltip.

listitem.simpara: the contents of the tooltip for widget

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_get_datatype ()
refsect2.para: Gets the column data_type for application use

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_datatype ()
refsect2.para: Sets the column data data_type for application use

listitem.simpara: the description or NULL, You should free the returned string with g_free() when done.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_description ()
gtk_sheet_column_get_format ()
refsect2.para: Gets the column data formatting pattern

listitem.simpara: the formatting pattern or NULL, You should free the returned string with g_free() when done.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_format ()
refsect2.para: Sets the column data formatting pattern.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_iskey ()
refsect2.para: Sets the column is_key flag. This flag has no effect on calculation or presentation, it is reserved for application usage.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_get_entry_type ()
refsect2.para: Gets the column entry type if known

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_entry_type ()
refsect2.para: Supersedes the sheet entry type for this column. Pass G_TYPE_NONE to reset the column to the sheet entry type.

refsect2.title: gtk_sheet_column_set_readonly ()
refsect2.para: Sets the column readonly flag. A cell is editable if the sheet is not locked, the column is not readonly and the cell (-range) was set to editable.

refsect2.title: The "dataformat" property
refsect2.para: a formatting string that controls what you see when the widget doesn't contain input focus

refsect2.title: The "datatype" property
refsect2.para: no functionality, a datatype hint for the application because any widget content is text

refsect2.title: The "max-length" property
refsect2.para: Maximum number orf characters in this column, Zero if no maximum.
This property is passed to the sheet entry editor. It is supported for the following editors: GtkItemEntry, GtkEntry, GtkDataTextView

refsect2.title: The "max-length-bytes" property
refsect2.para: Set the maximum length in bytes for the GtkDataEntry. For details see gtk_data_entry_set_max_length_bytes.
This property is passed to the sheet entry editor. It is supported for the following editors: GtkItemEntry, GtkDataTextView.

Sometimes, systems cannot handle UTF-8 string length correctly, to overcome this problem, you can use the maximum string length in bytes. When setting both limits, max-length and max-length-bytes, both must be fulfilled.

refsect2.title: The "position" property
refsect2.para: The packing position of the column

refsect2.title: The "wrap-mode" property
refsect2.para: This property is passed to the sheet entry editor. It is supported for the following editors: GtkTextView, GtkDataTextView.
